statement: It is a vaccination certificate that organizers of events should be able to request upon entry.
It is more money on defense that the Netherlands should spend.

It is the European Union (EU) that the Netherlands should exit.

It is an additional tax on purchasing meat that there should be.
It is public broadcasting that less funding should go to.
It is a national healthcare fund for everyone that there should be instead of the existing health insurance companies.
It is the ban on face-covering clothing that the government should abolish.
It is where new residential areas are built that the national government, rather than provinces and municipalities, should decide.
It is the VAT on cultural activities that the government should reduce to 5 percent.

It is land currently used for agriculture that Houses should be built on.
It is the same tax benefits as households with two working partners that households with two partners, one of whom works, should receive.
It is the historical slave trade that the Dutch government should apologize for.
It is the opportunity to block laws passed by parliament through a referendum that citizens should have.
It is as much as secondary school teachers that primary school teachers should earn.
It is fewer options for community service sentences instead of prison sentences that there should be.

It is a middle school that should be established so that students make a choice between vocational education, general secondary education, or pre-university education at a later age.

It is the statutory pension scheme that all employed persons are to be required to be insured in.

It is revenue generated in Germany from digital services that a national tax is to be levied on.
It is the traditional family of father, mother and children that is to be promoted more strongly than other living arrangements.

It is in the long term that the registration of new cars with combustion engines should also be possible.
It is more responsibilities in school policy that the federal government is to be given.

It is comprehensive public procurement reform that (e.g. opening up large-scale centralised public procurement to smaller firms) is needed.

It is the current three-month unemployment benefit that should be extended.

It is voting age for elections that should be 16
It is Internet access that should be free for all.

It is an independent ministry for the environment that is needed.
It is an animal rights commissioner that should be introduced.

It is pensions that are to be reduced (lowering the minimum conversion rate from 6.8% to 6%).

It is the requirements for the high school that the federal government should raise.
It is equal educational opportunities that the state should be more committed to (e.g., through subsidized remedial courses for students from low-income families).
It is conditions for naturalization that should be relaxed (e.g., shorter residence period).

It is taxed separately that married couples be (individual taxation).
It is the introduction of a national inheritance tax on all inheritances over one million Swiss francs that there should be.

It is farmers with proof of ecological performance that direct payments should only be granted to.

It is 30% of Switzerland's land area that should be dedicated to preserving biodiversity?

It is the Bilateral Agreements with the EU that Switzerland should terminate and seek a free trade agreement without the free movement of persons.
It is a strict interpretation of neutrality that Switzerland should return to (renounce economic sanctions to a large extent).
